updateElements.mainContentHeader: Please click on 'Update Device' and follow the on-screen instructions.
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Please note that your device will restart during this update.
updateElements.mainContentText:
Backup Your Data: Before proceeding with the update, it's essential to back up all your data. 

Flexible Scheduling: You have the flexibility to choose when to update your device. 

Final Deadline: Please be aware that your device may be locked if the OS is not updated by the deadline shown in this window.

If you have any questions or concerns please call us on 9391 7799.

Best regards,
ICT Team
